title: Google Play de Chou Musou!? Tensei shitara Android User Datta. Special

synonyms: 【Tokubetsuhan】Google Play de Chou Musou!? Tensei shitara Android User Datta., Google Play MV
alternative_titles.ja: 【特別版】Google Play で超無双！？転生したら Android ユーザーだった。

synopsis:
Special episode for Google Play de Chou Musou!? Tensei shitara Android User Datta.
Contains additional scenes and longer version of the song Insomnia by Eve.
